text: Marina South Pier MRT station (NS28) is an underground Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station along the North South Line, in Straits View planning area, Singapore. It is the southern terminal station of the North South Line. The station is located near the Marina South Pier and the Marina Bay Cruise Centre Singapore. ==Related pages== *Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations Category:2014 establishments in Asia Category:2010s establishments in Singapore
title: Marina South Pier MRT station
